title: Portable Projector, ELEGIANT Portable Mini Home Theater LED Video Projector 1080P 1500 Lumens 800x480 Resolution for TV Laptop SD Android TV Box Support USB SD AV VGA TV Interface
feature: ★【 Portable Design】8.1*5.9*3.5 ( L*W*H) Inches, Portable design, Small Size, suitable for travel, camping, and outdoor party. Enjoy happy movie or football match after family dinner or BBQ Party at home or courtyard. Easy to share sweet pictures with your family and friends.

★【Crystal Clear Image】Super Color Technology delivers superior,1500 lumens LED brightness and 800 x 480p native resolution (support 1080p and 720p), can provide crystal clear image in the dark environment! Projection Distance is 1~5m, and Projection Size is 50~150 inches.

★【Multimedia Interfaces】Multiple alternative interfaces like AV\VGA\USB\SD\TV \High Definition Multimedia Interface slots which make it possible to connect desktop, notebook, tablet, DVD, WII, XBOX game machine, TV box, hard disk, MP5, digital camera to this projector.

★【Completely sealed designed】 High-efficiency ventilation design, largely upgraded the stability and lifetime, LED lamp, works for over 50000 hours, with vivid color and abundant details; Optical keystone correction function, which can adjust keystone distortion of images.

★【System Support】 Multi-media (Music, Picture, Video, TXT); Enjoying watching movie at home and outside for camping. Not recommended for PPT or business presentation, ideal for home theater movies and video game use.
